data.actual_result: You can mark as read something already marked as read, or even the void in the case of servers with no channels. It does nothing but sends a useless request to the API
data.expected_result: "Mark as Read" should not be there or should be grayed out as on Desktop
data.short_description: You are still given the option to mark as read a server / channel with no unreads, as well as a server with no channels, while those options are grayed out on Desktop
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a server / channel with no unreads, or find a server with no text channels - Open the server/channel action sheet
